name: JUMPER: SPEEDRUN (itch)
description:
JUMPER : SPEEDRUN is an FPS Platformer game. The player will travel from point A to point B. You'll be forced to avoid many traps like Lasers, Mines and many other traps in order to reach your goal. Also there is Puzzles in the game you must solve. sometimes you must be fast !
You will find upgrade points in some levels to upgrade and unlock new Abilities to help you in this game

Features:
  • Unlock new abilities that will help you to finish the levels fast
  • Sometimes you need to solve puzzles
  • For now there is About 40 levels some of them are hidden

EASY TO LEARN. HARD TO MASTER

WILL YOU ACCEPT THE CHALLENGE ?

Next i will add more maps and do some work on the existing one , also i will add more Music and new effects and fix the timing


Minimum System Requirements :

Only 64Bit OS : Windows Vista , Windows 7 , Windows 8 , Windows 8.1 , Windows 10

CPU : Intel Core2 Duo 1.8 Ghz or better, AMD Athlon X2 2.4 Ghz or better

RAM : 2 GB RAM

GPU : NVIDIA GeForce 8800GT or better, ATI Radeon HD 3850 or better

Hard Disk : 4GB of free space

Sound : Any sound card that supports at least DirectX 9.0c
